en.dispensedApprovedAppStatusMsg: Your ‘dispense with service’ application has been approved
en.dispensedApprovedAppStatusMsgDetails1: The court has accepted your application to 'dispense with service' and that your {{ divorceWho }} doesn’t have to be served the divorce application.
en.dispensedApprovedAppStatusMsgDetails2: You can now continue with the next stage and apply for a decree nisi.
